levels.description: Throws giant spinning shurikens, the target's Movement Speed reduces by <@ba.vup>{-attack@move_speed:0%}</> for a short time and dealing <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> of <@ba.vup>ATK Arts damage</> to the target per second
